author: newsr.in
title: Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain Review (PC)
text: The Metal Gear saga has been around for decades and amassed a cult-like following for both its games and its creator, Hideo Kojima. After quite a few spinoffs and side stories, the famous designer is back with his magnum opus - Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain. Promising to deliver a new story with some classic characters as well as bigger worlds and more varied missions, the new title seems to be the quintessential Metal Gear Solid experience.
